ygData.subject: Re: My 2 cents on the status of EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, thanks man. i would be 19 by now if i hadnt died 3 times in one night at unrest... i have a newfound hatred for hags... i m just patiently waiting to hit
ygData.messageBody:
heh, thanks man. i would be 19 by now if i hadnt died 3 times in one night
at unrest... i have a newfound hatred for hags... i'm just patiently
waiting to hit 20 so i can get my last name. =)

by the way, if anyone is into research and is level 16 or above, and knows
reliable clerics and tanks, go to unrest. lots of pages to be found, lots
of words as well (for whoever uses em). also lots of loot. you can split 3
ways and get 5 gold each on some MOBs, as wel as brass armor, bronze and FS
weapons, magic items... and it's easy to not die if your party knows what
they are doing (or if you dont get trained on, my 3 deaths were due to
someone training undead knights and hags to the zone point).

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 18th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 12:18 PM 5/20/99 EDT, you wrote:
